document_data.name: ''Arafaj''
document_data.location: The [[Burning Pool of Natifa]], the [[High Desert]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Arafaj''''' were enchanted aquatic plants that grew on the surface of the [[Burning Pool of Natifa]] in the [[High Desert]] of [[west Zakhara]].
document_data.Description: These lanky plants resembled bundles of dry grass. ''Arafaj'' completely covered the surface water of the Burning Pool of Natifa. The plants burned continuously so long as they remained in contact with the pool regardless of weather conditions. Their illumination could be seen as far as {{SI|10|mi|k}} away.
